# .github Directory

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration files for the KhazarLLMs repository.

## Contents

### ðŸ“‹ Templates

- **`ISSUE_TEMPLATE/`** - Issue templates for bug reports and feature requests
  - `bug_report.md` - Template for reporting bugs
  - `feature_request.md` - Template for suggesting new features

- **`pull_request_template.md`** - Template for pull requests with checklist

### ðŸ¤– Workflows (GitHub Actions)

- **`workflows/ci.yml`** - Continuous Integration pipeline
- **`workflows/code-quality.yml`** - Code quality checks
- **`workflows/release.yml`** - Release automation

### ðŸ‘¥ Code Review

- **`CODEOWNERS`** - Defines code owners for automatic review requests

### ðŸ“– Documentation

- **`COPILOT_INSTRUCTIONS.md`** - Comprehensive guide for GitHub Copilot Coding Agent

## Resources

- [GitHub Actions Documentation](https://docs.github.com/en/actions)
- [About Issue Templates](https://docs.github.com/en/communities/using-templates-to-encourage-useful-issues-and-pull-requests)

*This directory helps automate and streamline the development workflow for KhazarLLMs.*
